mean_en: a printed statement that describes something (such as a new business or investment) and that is sent to people who may want to be involved in it or invest in it
sentence: He\u0027s reading the prospectuses of different universities so he can choose the best one.
sentence_trans: 他正在阅读不同大学的简介来选出最好的一所。
word_etyma: pro向前 ＋ spect看 ＋ us用 → 用来向前看的东西 → prospectus计划书；大纲
